alert.note: Alert for Coastal Flagler; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 1:27PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Flagler, south central St. Johns and southeastern Putnam Counties through 200 PM EDT... At 127 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Andalusia, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Palm Coast, Bunnell, Crescent City, Pomona Park, East Palatka, Andalusia, San Mateo, Espanola and Lake Como. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Flagler; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns
